name: Primal Lands
description: Primal Lands is set in the Stone Age, you will take control of a small tribe that you must guide in surviving what lies ahead. Unknown to their surrounds you must take each action carefully.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
